title: Morristown National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       National Park Service Sites: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Ellis Island, part of Statue of Liberty National Monument Gateway National Recreation Area Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park Statue of Liberty National Monument Thomas Edison National Historical Park Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Trail  State and Local Sites: Crossroads of the American Revolution National Heritage Area Lewis Morris County Park Fosterfields Living Historical Farm Patriot's Path Frelinghuysen Arboretum Historic Speedwell Morris County Park Commission Acorn Hall, Morris County Historical Society Macculloch Hall Historical Museum Monmouth Battlefield State Park Washington Crossing State Park Fort Lee Historic Park Old Barracks Museum  Local Tourism Bureau Morris County Tourism Bureau
